original_text: These things will frighten people because they do not understand them. The powerful things in the sky will shake. People will be very afraid about what will happen next in the world. They will become very weak and fall to the ground.
korean_text: 사람들이 세상에 임할 일을 생각하고 무서워하므로 기절하리니 이는 하늘의 권능들이 흔들리겠음이라

sentences.original_text: because they do not understand them
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 그것들을 이해하지 못하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: The powerful things in the sky will shake
about what will happen next in the world
sentences.korean_translation: 세상에서 다음에 무슨 일이 일어날지에 대해
